sentence.Network_en: The news gave a fillip to the telecommunications sector.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个消息给电信部门注入了一针强心剂。

sentence.Network_en: A drop in interest rates gave a welcome fillip to the housing market.
sentence.Network_cn: 降低利率给房屋市场带来利好刺激。

sentence.Network_en: This will prove a much-needed fillip to racecourses and the racing industry in general.
sentence.Network_cn: 这将会证明是赛马场和整个赛马业迫切需要的激励。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 以p结尾的英语英文单词 ... equip 装备，配备 fillip 弹指,刺激 flagship 旗舰.

list.abs: exports to China the economy may expand by 8 % this year ( see Economics focus ) , will provide a fillip .对中国的出口今年可能增加8%，这会成为一项动力。
some are hoping for a swift return as-usual , with an American recovery providing a new fillip to China's exporters .一些人希望快速恢复“常态”，即美国复苏，为中国出口商带来新的推动力。
A few jokes will add a final fillip to your speech ., 几句笑话会给你的演说添些生气.
Replenishing inventory will be a temporary fillip without an increase in consumer demand ., 补充存货是在需求还未增加的基础上临时的刺激方式.
Replenishing inventory will be a temporary fillip without an increase in consumer demand ., 没有消费需求的增长 , 增加库存只是个短期的刺激.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'make a fillip with the fingers'): symbolic; compare with flick, flip

entry.def: If someone or something gives a fillip to an activity or person, they suddenly encourage or improve them.

example.ex: The news gave a fillip to the telecommunications sector...
example.tran: 这个消息给电信部门注入了一针强心剂。

example.ex: This will prove a much-needed fillip to racecourses and the racing industry in general.
example.tran: 这将会证明是赛马场和整个赛马业迫切需要的激励。

auth_sentence.content: Now larger rural populations can become a fillip to growth.
auth_sentence.res_content: Now larger rural populations can become a fillip to growth.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Now larger rural populations can become a fillip to growth.

auth_sentence.content: That's a real fillip for some of the smaller clubs.
auth_sentence.res_content: That's a real fillip for some of the smaller clubs.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That's a real fillip for some of the smaller clubs.

auth_sentence.content: Competing in Sochi will be a great fillip for British winter sports.
auth_sentence.res_content: Competing in Sochi will be a great fillip for British winter sports.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Competing in Sochi will be a great fillip for British winter sports.
